name: Blob World
description:
DISCLAIMER:

  • When pressing "Next Level" on last level, it will take you to main menu
  • There are bugs!
  • Level design isn't very polished sadly :(

You are a blob! Outrun your enemies or sacrifice a part of you to the Blob god in exchange for some awesome abilities or blob helpers!

Search for the teleporter to take you to new worlds but be ware of the dangers that lurk at every corner!

Move: WASD

Abilities: 

  • Q: Spawn melee unit
  • E: Spawn healer unit

Regroup units to you: Spacebar

Pause Menu: Esc
